summary: The outskirts of whiterun has been turned into forest with increased wildlife, camp's and hunting stand's.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS]Hunter's Run
[/font]
[/b] I've always found the outskirts of Whiterun to be a little bland so I decided to add a bit of a forest and I've always liked using hunterborn so this was my attempt to make it a little bit better.

1.  added forest (obviously)
2.  added 2 campsites and 2 hunting stands 
3.  increased animal population (mostly elk and deer)  might be a little too dense let me know

conflicts.  Let me know if you find any.

Sorry for the vanilla ish images I can't for the life of me get enb series to keep from CTDing even with a clean install.
author: ahcrapnotagain
